attributes.action: Protect the Health and Lives of UK Residents irrespective of EU regulations, by preventing the importation of foods or livestock from countries with disease infected animals or animal products likely to be health or life threatening to UK residents or risk the health of our birds and animals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having listened to David Milliband this morning (sunday 11th Feb, 2007) in an interview with Andrew Marr, I was incensed that he used the excuse that it was "against EU rules" to stop imports from another EU country.
I have since decided to start a petition against this regulation as I don't see it as a right of the EU to dictate what the UK Government does to protect its residents from importation of food from an area that had diseased animals  that could introduce the disease into our food chain or risk the health of our birds and animals.
